title: Bloomberg Markets: Parmar Says Humans Beating Computers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Parmar Says Humans Beating Computers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Hema Parmar\u0010Hedge Fund Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Brief\u0010Discussing why human stock pickers at hedge funds are leading the pack this year, while computer-run strategies pull up the rear.
